client_description.Summary Note:
Kristensen Petersen Thomsen and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Copenhagen. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Kristensen Petersen Thomsen is a 34 year old Financial Advisor from Denmark.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description.Family Background: Kristensen Petersen Thomsen and Amanda have been married since 2018. Together they have 2 kids called Krog and Alberte.
client_description.Education Background:
Kristensen finished secondary school at Svendborg Gymnasium in 2010.
He then attended University of Copenhagen, which he graduated in 2014.
client_description.Occupation History:
Kristensen Petersen Thomsen is a 34 year old Financial Advisor from Denmark.
At Nordea Private Banking Danmark, Kristensen Petersen Thomsen held the position of Financial Advisor from 2015 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 380000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns condo in Næstved, where he resides. It is worth 1020000 DKK.

He inherited 18710000 DKK from his grandfather, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2019, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description.Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
